title: Proposal
description: A short description of the post.

author.name: Choong Shi Lian Selene, Jiang Weiling Angeline, Wong Wei Sheng Dylan

contents:
Background
Motivation
Project Objectives
The project aims to deliver an R-Shiny app that provides interactive user interface design to: * Understand the correlation of factors affecting greenhouse gases emissions * Identify important factors which contributes to greenhuose gases emissions using Panel data regression * Further analyse the difference in greenhuose gases emissions by country and time period
Proposed Scope and Methodology
Storyboard & Visualization Features
Exploratory Data Analysis
Validation Tests
Calibration of Model
Proposed R Packages
Data Preparation
tidyverse: https://www.tidyverse.org
Panel data regression
ExPanDaR: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ExPanDaR
plm: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/plm
Building Shiny App
shiny: https://shiny.rstudio.com
shinythemes: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/shinythemes
shinyWidgets: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/shinyWidgets
RColorBrewer: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RColorBrewer
Project Timeline
Team Members
